items.title: Durvalumab Plus FLOT Ups Survival in Early Upper-GI Cancer
items.description: Overall survival outcomes in MATTERHORN trial support perioperative durvalumab plus chemotherapy as standard of care. Medscape Medical News

items.title: Abemaciclib Ups Overall Survival in High-Risk Breast Cancer
items.description: Adding the CDK4/6 inhibitor abemaciclib to endocrine therapy significantly improves overall survival in node-positive, high-risk early breast cancer, ...

items.title: Cannabis Extract Relieves Chronic Low Back Pain
items.description: Data from a phase 3 study suggest that VER-01, a cannabis extract, provides sustained pain reduction for chronic low back pain vs placebo. Medscape Me...

items.title: 'Diet' Foods May Be Undermining Your Patients’ Weight Loss
items.description: "Diet" branding often obscures high‑calorie, low‑satiety foods that can derail patients' weight‑management plan. Medscape Medical News
